mapper.update: update t_uc_company_certificate set comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, identity_front = #{identityFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity_back = #{identityBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, three_certificates = #{threeCertificates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yingyezhizhao = #{yingyezhizhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuzhijigou = #{zuzhijigou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shuiwudengji = #{shuiwudengji,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yinghangkaihu = #{yinghangkaihu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yingyunxuke = #{yingyunxuke,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where certi_id = #{certiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select certi_id, comp_id, identity_front, identity_back, three_certificates, yingyezhizhao, zuzhijigou, shuiwudengji, yinghangkaihu, yingyunxuke from t_uc_company_certificate where certi_id = #{certiId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select certi_id, comp_id, identity_front, identity_back, three_certificates, yingyezhizhao, zuzhijigou, shuiwudengji, yinghangkaihu, yingyunxuke from t_uc_company_certificate

select certi_id, comp_id, identity_front, identity_back, three_certificates, yingyezhizhao, zuzhijigou, shuiwudengji, yinghangkaihu, yingyunxuke from t_uc_company_certificate WHERE comp_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
